meanings.sent1: The rainproofed jacket kept me dry during the storm.
meanings.sent2: She wore a rainproofed hat to protect herself from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The rainproofed umbrella saved the day when unexpected rain poured down.
meanings.sent4: His rainproofed shoes were like shields against the relentless rain.
meanings.sent5: The rainproofed tent stood strong against the heavy rain, proving its worth.

meanings.definition: Treated to be impervious to rain.
meanings.sent1: The rainproofed windows prevented any water from seeping in.
meanings.sent2: The rainproofed fabric of the awning kept the patio dry during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The rainproofed roof made the house feel invincible against the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her rainproofed bag was a lifesaver when caught in a sudden downpour.
meanings.sent5: The rainproofed paint on the fence gleamed even after hours of heavy rain.
